alert.note: Alert for Mellette; Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 29 at 5:56PM MDT until June 29 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN TODD...TRIPP AND MELLETTE COUNTIES... At 655 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southeast of Horse Creek to 7 miles south of Carter to 4 miles east of Millboro, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Carter, Millboro and Wewela around 700 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Witten, Winner and Ideal South Housing. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with these storms may occur before or after any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows for several minutes after rain ends.
